Performing triple junction identification using OVITO Python package

Tutorial on TripleJunction.py

2025-03-27 Software · Tutorials Python TripleJunction.py Algorithms

This is a tutorial on how to identify triple junctions in polycrystalline materials using OVITO modifiers and TripleJunction.py

Getting started
